properties.markdownProperty:
It is used to store reference (identifier) to other object or documents within the project. It has some special **optional** attributes:
- `acceptedTargets`: List of proteus classes that accept as reference. By default its value is `:Proteus-any` (all classes accepted). - `excludedTargets`: List of excluded proteus classes for target selection. By default its value is "" (no classes excluded). - `traceType`: Type of the trace. By default `:Proteus-dependency`. Other proteus trace types are: `:Proteus-author`, `:Proteus-information-source`, `:Proteus-works-for`, `:Proteus-affected`, `:Proteus-link`. - `maxTargetsNumber`: Max number of referenced objects. By default is `-1` (no targets limit).
``` <traceProperty name="prepared-by" category="dependencies" acceptedTargets="organization" traceType=":Proteus-author"/> ``` ``` <traceProperty name="base-type" category="general" acceptedTargets="object-type" traceType=":Proteus-dependency" maxTargetsNumber="1"> <trace target="8GuCNMEuJNUL" traceType=":Proteus-dependency"/> </traceProperty> ```
